room_title: Escape room "Merlin's Wizarding Academy" by Boxroom Escape Games in Miami
review: I've done quite a few escape rooms at different locations in Miami and Houston and this is one of my favorites! My friends and I started with the easiest room (Merlin) and got out with plenty of time to spare so it's probably best for people new to escape games! Can't wait to come back and try the other two rooms :)

room_title: Escape room "Merlin's Wizarding Academy" by Boxroom Escape Games in Miami
review: Fantastic quality and very original room. Top notch Merlin, will try Pirate soon.

room_title: Escape room "Merlin's Wizarding Academy" by Boxroom Escape Games in Miami
review: Nice place, clean, people were really nice. We came with our 9 and 12 year old daughters and did the Wizard room.

room_title: Escape room "Merlin's Wizarding Academy" by Boxroom Escape Games in Miami
review: Probably one of the best rooms I've done in the area. The puzzles are fun, the rooms are super well designed and the ending of the Merlin room literally had me jumping up and down.

room_title: Escape room "Merlin's Wizarding Academy" by Boxroom Escape Games in Miami
review: Hands down the best room in my opinion; super neat decor and fun puzzle!
